Glary Utilities - a collection of system tweaking and utilities for tweaking , improving overall productivity and protect your PC . This application allows the user to get rid of unnecessary files from the old records and the history of Internet activity , by installing various plugins, one can achieve full compatibility of applications with more than 45 different programs . Furthermore , Glary Utilities will optimize the use of system memory, search .

Glary Utilities is a collection of system tools and utilities to fix, speed up, maintain and protect your PC. It allows you to clean common system junk files, as well as invalid registry entries and Internet traces (theres a plug-in support for 45 + external programs). You can also manage and delete browser add-ons, analyze disk space usage and find duplicate files.

A set of tools :
- Disk Cleaner - Removes junk data from your disks and recovers disk space
- Registry Cleaner - Clean Registry Scan and clean up your registry to improve system performance.
- Shortcuts Fixer - Corrects the errors in your startmenu & desktop shortcuts
- Uninstall Manager - Uninstalls programs completely that you do not need any more
- Startup Manager - Manages programs which run automatically run
- Memory Optimizer - Monitors and optimizes free memory in the background
- Context Menu Manager - Manager context menu controls context menu for files , folders ...
- Tracks Eraser - Erases all the traces of the Internet : Events, cookies, internet history ...
- File Shredder - Erases files permanently so that no possibility of recovery.
- File Undelete - Quick and effective way to restore accidentally deleted files
- File Encrypter and Decrypter - Protects your files from unauthorized access and use.
- Disk Analyzer - Display disk space occupied by files and folders.
- Search for duplicate files - Finds and removes empty folders and duplicated
- File Splitter and Joiner - Splits large files into smaller manageable , and then rejoin .
- Process Manager - Monitors programs that run on your computer , and blocking software - Spyware and Trojans.
- Assistant Internet Explorer - Manages Internet Explorer Add-
- Windows Standard Tools - Provides direct access to the useful functions of the windows settings to the default
